titles.title: Earnings Test Elimination
Older Americans' Freedom to Work Act of 1993
A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the earnings test for individuals who have attained retirement age.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S717)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 1/26/1993--Introduced. Older Americans' Freedom to Work Act of 1993 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to remove the limitation on the amount of outside income which beneficiaries who have attained retirement age may earn without incurring a reduction in benefits.
